title: Fruit of the Loom Eversoft Fleece Joggers with Pockets, Relaxed Fit, Moisture Wicking, Breathable, Tapered Sweatpants
description: Relaxed Joggers with Banded Cuff at Ankle
Eversoft fabric provides premium softness wash after wash
Elastic quick cord for adjustable waist
Double needle stitching on the hems for added durability
Deep Pockets to Keep Items Secure

Fruit of the Loom® fleece is made with EverSoft®  fabric  for premium softness wash after wash. This fleece collection is now better than ever! The EverSoft®  fleece collection offers a variety of great benefits like wicking and odor protection, which will help keep you feeling fresh all day. Our sweatpants come in a variety of great colors to create the perfect look. Stay confident knowing that Fruit of the Loom® has you covered for whatever the day brings, so don't sweat the small stuff.
